headline: C.H. Robinson Worldwide (CHRW) Unveils Cross-Border Service with AI-Driven Freight Savings
summary: C.H. Robinson Worldwide (CHRW) recently launched a new cross-border service, which aims to enhance efficiency for shippers with up to 40% savings and improved freight visibility by up to 48 hours. This initiative likely added weight to the broader 34% price move over the last quarter, aligning with significant market performance trends, where major indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq achieved record highs following favorable macroeconomic indicators, including anticipated interest rate cuts...

headline: C.H. Robinson Introduces Cross-border Freight Consolidation Service
summary: EDEN PRAIRIE, Minn., September 11, 2025--C.H. ROBINSON INTRODUCES CROSS-BORDER FREIGHT CONSOLIDATION SERVICE
